tool_description: This API shows the latest news regarding the theme of Climate Change
name: News from Climate Change
title: News from Climate Change

api_list.name: Get specific news from a source
api_list.description: This endpoint returns news about climate change on a specific source of information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-from-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-from-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-from-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-from-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all latest news on climate change
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news regarding climate change, from all over the world.
